name: [Upcoming]Friday night funkin's vs Cinder (Full week)
description:
FNF VS Cinder is a Modpack based off a Rivals Of Aether character of mine that I'm planning to make as a full week with original songs hopefully


The Modpack will give the game a fresh coat of paint, respriting the game from the ground up with my own style (well, just for the week). 


And we might as well add more than just that later on.

The full week should potentially include:

  • All Visuals changed to a nice new pixelated style, Completely different to that of Week 6
  • 3 Full Songs
  • An Attacking/Dodging mechanic introduced near the final songs, another gimmick to raise difficulty courtesy of Cinder's origin as a fighting game character 
  • a plot of some sort (maybe)

As of now here's what's done for the mod (as of me posting this, its very early into development so don't expect much until later on)
(come back later!)

  • All of Boyfriend's non gimmick animations are completed
  • Cinder Idle + Backward Animations completed
  • Still Don't Have a music artist

this couldn't go wrong right?
